T01D1110:8a-33: 'jig rten gsum gyis ma sod par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:8a-34: bdag cag lus tsam tha dad kyi /
T01D1110:8a-35: sems ni de lta ma yin par tha dad pa med par mdzod cig ces byas pa dang /
T01D1110:8a-36: tshangs pas kyang mchog byin no //
T01D1110:8a-37: de nas de gnyis kyis khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bya ba la zhugs par gyur to //
T01D1110:8a-38: lha rnams kyis de gnyis gsod pa'i thabs la dpyod par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:8a-40: de dag gcig la gcig gsod pa'i thabs bsgrub par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /
T01D1110:8a-41: lha rnams kyis rang gi lus las 'od til 'bru til 'bru tsam byin nas /
T01D1110:8a-42: de las thig le'i mchog ma zhes bya ba'i lha'i bu mo zhig bskyed nas /
T01D1110:8b-0: de yang tshangs @8b pa la bskor ba byed du bcug pa dang /
T01D1110:8b-1: de de'i gzugs la yid rnam par g-yengs pas lta ba na /
T01D1110:8b-2: ngo tsha bar gyur pas gdong bzhi sprul par gyur to //
T01D1110:8b-3: de bzhin du lha chen po yang de dang 'dra
T01D1110:8b-4: bar 'dod chags kyi dbang gis gdong bzhi sprul par
T01D1110:8b-6: lha chen thig le'i mchog ma la //
T01D1110:8b-7: rab tu chags pas gdong bzhi byung //
T01D1110:8b-9: lha chen zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum gyi mtshon cha yod pa'o //
T01D1110:8b-10: thig le'i mchog ma la zhes bya ba ni lha'i bu mo'o //
T01D1110:8b-11: chags pa skyes pas zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i bsam pa skyes pa la zhugs pa'o //
T01D1110:8b-12: gdong bzhi byung zhes bya ba ni gang gdong bzhi par gyur pa'o //
T01D1110:8b-14: bdud kyi bu mos sgeg pa yis //
T01D1110:8b-15: khyod kyi ba spu'i rtse mi g-yo //
T01D1110:8b-17: bdud dang rjes su 'brel ba'i bu mo ni bdud kyi bu mo ste /
T01D1110:8b-19: dga' mo zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas pa la bya'o //
T01D1110:8b-20: de rnams kyi sgeg pa ni dgod cing smra ba dang zur gyis blta ba dang /
T01D1110:8b-21: gar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T01D1110:8b-23: khyed kyi zhes bya ba ni mgon po khyed kyi'o //
T01D1110:8b-24: ba spu'i rtse zhes bya ba ni sku'i yan lag
T01D1110:8b-25: gi ba spu'i rtse mo yang mi g-yo zhing 'gyur
T01D1110:8b-26: ba med pa'o // de yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshe /
T01D1110:8b-27: so so skye bo'i gnas skabs na yang de dag
T01D1110:8b-28: gis 'dod chags bskyed par ma nus so zhes ston
T01D1110:8b-29: pa yin no // lha chen phyed ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:8b-30: phyed ni chung ma zhes bya ba lus kyi phyed chung ma ste /
T01D1110:8b-31: lha mo au ma 'chang zhing 'dzin par byed pas
T01D1110:8b-32: na ngur pa zhes bya ba'i byas kyang thub cing
T01D1110:8b-34: gang gi phyir de ni phan tshun tha dad pa'i lus can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T01D1110:8b-35: de yang 'di ltar gang gi tshe lha chen po
T01D1110:8b-36: 'di au ma dang lhan cig lo stong gi bar
T01D1110:8b-37: du 'dod pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba na
T01D1110:8b-38: / ji tsam na de khu ba 'byin pa'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i tshe /
T01D1110:8b-40: re zhig lus kyi phyogs gcig gis 'dod pa'i bde ba la ngas longs spyod par gyur gyis /
T01D1110:8b-41: da ni yid dga' ba nyid kyis nga'i phyed lus
T01D1110:8b-42: kyi phyed du zhugs par byas la khyad par can
T01D1110:8b-43: gyi bde ba nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste
T01D1110:9a-1: med kyi dbang phyug ces bya bar gyur to //
T01D1110:9a-3: khyed ni bde bar bgyid pa yi //
T01D1110:9a-4: zhes bya ba 'khrul bar byed pa'i 'dod pa nyid kyis rmongs ma gyur ces bya ba ste /
T01D1110:9a-5: 'khrul cing chags par ma gyur pa //
T01D1110:9a-7: 'khor lo mdung thung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
T01D1110:9a-8: 'khor lo gang la yod pa de ni 'khor lo can te /
T01D1110:9a-9: 'khor lo'i mtshon cha thogs pa khyab 'jug ces bya ba'i don to //
T01D1110:9a-10: mdung thung can ni lha chen po ste /
T01D1110:9a-11: mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'o //
T01D1110:9a-12: bdud kyi stobs ni bdud kyi dpung bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug go //
T01D1110:9a-13: rgyal ba ni zil gyis gnon pa ste /
T01D1110:9a-14: des dbang du bya bar mi nus pa'o //
T01D1110:9a-15: khyod ni 'khor lo mdung med par //
T01D1110:9a-16: byams pa'i mtshon gang lags pas rgyal //
T01D1110:9a-17: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
T01D1110:9a-18: bdud kyi stobs las rgyal bar bya ba la gang khyab 'jug dang /
T01D1110:9a-20: mdung med par yang byams pa'i mtshon chas mngon par rgyal zhing /
T01D1110:9a-21: bcom par spyod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1110:9a-22: rgan pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:9a-23: rgan pos khyab 'jug mda' yis bsnun //
T01D1110:9a-24: zhes bya ba ni 'di skad thos te /
T01D1110:9a-25: khyab 'jug gi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams sa phyogs 'ga' zhig tu chang 'thung zhing 'dug pa na /
T01D1110:9a-26: ji tsam na drang srong gnas ngan der nye bar song ba dang /
T01D1110:9a-27: ma 'gags pas bsams pa kho bos drang srong 'di la co 'dri bar bya'o snyam nas /
T01D1110:9a-28: bud med kyi gzugs su byas nas de'i thad du song ste /
T01D1110:9a-29: de la gus pa dang bcas pas rjes byas nas
T01D1110:9a-30: lto bar gzhong pa glan nas g-yogs te bcings pa
T01D1110:9a-31: bstan nas / kho mo'i dgu 'di na ci zhig yod /
T01D1110:9a-34: drang srong des bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis bltas pa
T01D1110:9a-35: las de la shin tu khro ba drag po skyes
T01D1110:9a-36: par gyur nas / khyod kyi khong nas lcags kyi
T01D1110:9a-37: gtun gang gis khyab 'jug gi rigs ma lus pa
T01D1110:9a-38: rlag par byed pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces de
T01D1110:9a-39: thams cad la dmod pa btab po //
T01D1110:9a-40: de nas ji tsam na lcags kyi gtun byung bar gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:9a-41: bishnu'i rigs thams cad 'ongs te lcags kyi gtun de chu dang rdo la bdar te /
T01D1110:9a-42: de 'dam dang bye ma 'dam bu'i rdzing gi nang du bor ro //
T01D1110:9a-43: de yang 'dam bu'i tshal du gyur to //
T01D1110:9b-0: yang @9b lcags kyi gtun de las mde'u tsam zhig lus par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:9b-1: 'dis ci zhig nus par 'gyur snyam nas chu bor dor ro //
T01D1110:9b-2: dor ba'i 'og tu nyas mid nas de yang rgya'i nang du chud de /
T01D1110:9b-3: nya pas khyer nas rngon pa rgan po zhig la btsongs so //
T01D1110:9b-4: des kyang nya de bshas pa dang /
T01D1110:9b-5: lcags kyi mde'u byung nas de mda'i mde'ur btags so //
T01D1110:9b-6: ji tsam na dmod pas nye bar bcom pa'i 'jigs pas dus 'ga' zhig gi tshe /
T01D1110:9b-7: rdzing gi ngogs der khyab 'jug gi rigs rnams chang 'thungs pas ra ro ba dang /
T01D1110:9b-8: dmod pas rnam par 'khrul pas rtsod pa chen po
T01D1110:9b-9: byung bar gyur nas 'dam bu'i dbyug pas phan tshun
T01D1110:9b-10: nye bar bsnun par byed pa na /
T01D1110:9b-11: de na med pa'i khyab 'jug ma gtogs pa de'i rigs rnams rnam par 'jig par gyur to //
T01D1110:9b-12: de nas khyab 'jug gis bsams pa nga'i chung ma'i
T01D1110:9b-13: tshogs khri drug stong grong khyer sgo ldan na gnas
T01D1110:9b-14: kyis / de dag gal te dmod pa 'dis phan tshun gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa'am /
T01D1110:9b-15: gzhan dag gis phrogs par 'gyur ba srid snyam nas /
T01D1110:9b-17: des kyang de rnams blangs la khyab 'jug gi thad
T01D1110:9b-18: du khyer te 'ong ngo zhes smras te chas so
T01D1110:9b-19: // ri brags pa rnams kyis kyang gtam de thos nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs te /
T01D1110:9b-20: srid sgrub kyi thad du 'thab pa'i phyir lhags pa dang /
T01D1110:9b-21: de rnams kyis srid sgrub kyi mtshon cha ma lus
T01D1110:9b-22: pa zad par byas nas de thams cad phrogs so
T01D1110:9b-23: // khyab 'jug gis de thos pa dang /
T01D1110:9b-24: yid kyi gdung ba bzlog par mi nus pas sems
T01D1110:9b-25: gdung bzhin du mya ngan de bsal ba'i phyir dgon
T01D1110:9b-26: par song ngo // der tshang tshing shin tu stug pa zhig tu /
T01D1110:9b-27: mya ngan gyi dbang gis lus thams cad phab nas 'dug ste /
T01D1110:9b-28: rkang pa brkyang pa'i mthe bo bskyod pa dang /
T01D1110:9b-29: ji tsam na rngon pa rgan po de ri dags bshor ba'i phyir nags tshal du zhugs te /
T01D1110:9b-30: ri dags blta ba'i phyir sems gtod cing gnas pa dang /
T01D1110:9b-31: mthe bo bskyod pa de ri dags kyi rna ba
T01D1110:9b-32: 'gul ba yin no snyam nas mda' bsnun pa dang
T01D1110:9b-33: / de srog dang bral bar byas so //
T01D1110:9b-34: rgan po zhes bya ba ni rngon pa rgan pos so //
T01D1110:9b-35: khyab 'jug ces bya ba ni sred med kyi bu'o //
T01D1110:9b-36: mda' yis zhes bya ba ni rngon pa'i mda' yis so //
T01D1110:10a-1: zhes bya ba ni bcom pa'o //
T01D1110:10a-2: lha chen mgrin pa sngor gyur pas //
T01D1110:10a-4: lha chen ni dbang phyug chen po ste /
T01D1110:10a-5: de yang dug gis nye bar bcom pas mgrin pa sngon por gyur to //
T01D1110:10a-6: de yang 'di ltar lha rnams rgya mtsho bsrub pa'i phyir zhugs pa na /
T01D1110:10a-7: de'i tshe nor bu koo stu bha dang /
T01D1110:10a-8: rta mgrin rings la sogs mang po zhig rgya mtsho las byung bar gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:10a-9: ji tsam na dug cig byung bar gyur nas de'i
T01D1110:10a-10: mthus khyab 'jug de'i gan na gnas pas pags pa'i
T01D1110:10a-12: lha chen pos de blangs nas 'jigs pa med par mid par rtsom pa na //
T01D1110:10a-13: ji tsam na mgrin par thogs te steng du yang ma byung /
T01D1110:10a-14: 'og tu yang ma song bar de'i mgrin pa rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar snang bar gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:10a-16: 'di ni shin tu mdzes pas da ni deng nas
T01D1110:10a-17: de mgrin pa nyid du bzhag pa'i rigs so zhes
T01D1110:10a-19: lha 'di gnyis la zhes bya ba ni /
T01D1110:10a-22: gnod bgyid mchis zhes bya ba ni /
T01D1110:10a-23: gnod pa dang bcas par gnas pas na gnod bgyid mchis zhes bya ste /
T01D1110:10a-24: gzhan gyis byas pa'i nye bar gnod pa'am gsod pa dang ldan pa'o //
T01D1110:10a-25: mgon khyod ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la bod pa ste /
T01D1110:10a-26: bdag po zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T01D1110:10a-27: / gnod pa bgyid pa med pas na gnod bgyid bral ba lags zhes bya'o //
T01D1110:10a-29: bcom ldan 'das la gzhan gyis byas pa'i bgrongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
T01D1110:10a-30: gzhan gyis byas pa'i gnod pa ni mnga' ste /
T01D1110:10a-31: bya rgod kyi phung por rdo'i dum bus zhabs snad pa yin no zhe na /
T01D1110:10a-33: de ni rma btod pa tsam du zad kyi /
T01D1110:10a-34: nye bar gnod pa zhes mi bya ste /
T01D1110:10a-35: de yang 'di ltar dus yun ring por zhugs pa'i
T01D1110:10a-36: nye bar 'tshe ba la gnod pa zhes bshad kyi
T01D1110:10a-37: / skad cig pa ni ma yin te /
T01D1110:10a-38: bcom ldan 'das ni skad cig ma de nyid la de tsam zhig tu 'gyur gyi /
T01D1110:10a-39: lha chen po'i mgrin pa sngo ba ji lta ba de la ni ma yin no //
T01D1110:10a-40: khyab 'jug mi thung gzugs bsgyur nas //
T01D1110:10a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:10a-43: stobs ldan zhes bya ba'i lha ma yin zhig byung ba dang /
T01D1110:10a-44: des rang gi pha rol gnon pas khams gsum ma
T01D1110:10a-45: lus pa rnam par gnon pa na khyab 'jug gis
T01D1110:10b-0: bsams pa / ngas 'di dang lhan @10b cig g-yul sprod par mi nus te /
T01D1110:10b-1: shin tu skyes bu'i rtsol ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T01D1110:10b-2: de bas na nges par sgyu thabs kyis bslu bar bya'o snyam du rnam par bsams nas /
T01D1110:10b-3: bdag nyid bram ze mi'u thung zhig gi gzugs su
T01D1110:10b-4: sprul nas slong mo'i bdag nyid can du byas te
T01D1110:10b-5: song nas / rgyal po stobs ldan rta'i mchod sbyin byed pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas pa'i tshe /
T01D1110:10b-7: gang la ci zhig sbyin par bya //
T01D1110:10b-8: zhes zer ba la brtson pa de'i thad du phyin nas /
T01D1110:10b-9: pha dang ma'i phyir me la mchod sbyin byed pas
T01D1110:10b-10: de'i don du sa phyogs gom pa nyid kyi tshad
T01D1110:10b-11: slong ngo zhes smras pa dang /
T01D1110:10b-13: 'di tsam zhig gis khyod la dgos pa ci zhig rdzogs par 'gyur /
T01D1110:10b-14: gzhan du na glang po dang /
T01D1110:10b-17: gser la sogs pa'i dngos po slongs shig dang /
T01D1110:10b-18: de ngas dgag pa med pa dang /
T01D1110:10b-19: khyad par dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o zhes smras kyang 'dod par ma gyur to //
T01D1110:10b-21: gal te de ltar 'dod na re zhig gom pa gsum yang khyer cig ces smras pa dang /
T01D1110:10b-22: khyab 'jug gis gom pa gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi bar du rkang pa gcig brkyang nas /
T01D1110:10b-23: gom pa gsum pa'i gnas ma rnyed pa dang /
T01D1110:10b-24: dam bcas pa las nyams par byas pa'i dor thabs khas blangs pas yid zhum par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:10b-25: 'jigs pa chen pos bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad bcom par gyur pas stobs ldan bzung ste /
T01D1110:10b-26: sa 'og tu bcings par gyur to //
T01D1110:10b-27: mi'u thung ni gzugs thung ba'o //
T01D1110:10b-29: bsgyur nas zhes bya ba ni mngon par sprul nas so //
T01D1110:10b-32: ci pha rol gnon pas sam zhe na /
T01D1110:10b-33: g-yo thabs kyis ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T01D1110:10b-35: stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'o //
T01D1110:10b-36: bslus zhes bya ba ni rgyal srid las nyams par byas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1110:10b-37: khyed ni gzhan dag la slu bar mi mdzad de /
T01D1110:10b-38: gal te g-yo mi mkhyen pas de'i phyir gzhan dag slu bar mi mdzad do zhes rtog pa la /
T01D1110:10b-39: de'i phyir g-yo yang mkhyen gyur la //
T01D1110:10b-41: de yang g-yo mkhyen pas na g-yo yang mkhyen gyur la zhes bya ba yin te /
T01D1110:11a-1: 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir /
T01D1110:11a-2: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T01D1110:11a-3: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen cing /
T01D1110:11a-4: nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa de ni spyod par mi mdzad pa ste /
T01D1110:11a-5: 'dir ral gri thogs pa'i gtso bo'i mdo dper brjod par bya'o //
T01D1110:11a-6: mgon khyod rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:11a-7: khyed kyi rdzu 'phrul pa rnams ni mgon khyod rdzu 'phrul te /
T01D1110:11a-8: yid mgyogs pa la sogs pa'o //
T01D1110:11a-9: de'i rnam par 'phrul ba ni rnam par rol ba'o //
T01D1110:11a-11: rmad byung zhes bya ba ste /
T01D1110:11a-12: ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1110:11a-14: zhes bya ba ni gom pa gsum gyis 'jig rten gsum rgal ba'o //
T01D1110:11a-15: 'phye bo zhes bya ba ni rkang pa med pa ste /
T01D1110:11a-17: de dang 'dra bar 'jug pas na 'phye bo bzhin du'o //
T01D1110:11a-20: gang khyed kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
T01D1110:11a-21: rmad du byung ba mthong ba des ni lha yul
T01D1110:11a-22: dang sa 'og tu khyab 'jug gis 'jig rten gsum
T01D1110:11a-23: rgal bar gyur pa yang 'phye po mchi ba bzhin
T01D1110:11a-24: du mthong ste / ci'i phyir zhe na /
T01D1110:11a-25: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams ni 'dzam bu'i gling tsam nyid la 'jig rten gsum du 'dod de ;
T01D1110:11a-26: rgya mtsho bzhis yongs su bcad pa 'jig rten gnyis kyi bar ni mi'i 'jig rten yin la /
T01D1110:11a-27: 'og gi gzhi ni klu'i 'jig rten no //
T01D1110:11a-28: ri kha ba can la sogs pa ri bo lha rnams gnas pa dang /
T01D1110:11a-29: skar ma la sogs pa ni lha'i 'jig rten nyid yin na /
T01D1110:11a-30: de khyab 'jug gis brgal bar byas pa 'di tsam
T01D1110:11a-31: la 'jig rten gsum rgal ba zhes bya ba la
T01D1110:11a-32: / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs bskyed pa tsam gyis /
T01D1110:11a-33: yid ltar mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi
T01D1110:11a-34: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa ya dpag
T01D1110:11a-35: tu med pa 'das pa'i 'od zer can gyi 'jig
T01D1110:11a-36: rten gyi khams nas myur ba nyid du gshegs pa
T01D1110:11a-38: gzhon nu tshangs par spyod pa na //
T01D1110:11a-43: rma bya la zhon pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs so //
T01D1110:11a-44: tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa spyod pa las log pa ste /
T01D1110:11b-0: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i @11b phyir chings pa nyid 'di ltar spyod pa'o //
T01D1110:11b-1: lhan cig ces bya ba ni dus gcig dang thabs cig pa'o //
T01D1110:11b-3: drug ldan ma dang zhes bya ba ste /
T01D1110:11b-4: de'i chung ma drug ldan ma zhes bya ba dang ngo //
T01D1110:11b-5: spyod ces bya ba ni spyod pa'i byed pa'am srung ba'o //
T01D1110:11b-7: drug ldan ma zhes bya ba'i lha'i bu mo mchog tu gzugs bzang ba /
T01D1110:11b-9: gzugs kyi nye bar spyod pa dang /
T01D1110:11b-10: bud med kyi yon tan gyis gzhan dag zil gyis mnan pas gnas pa zhig byung bar gyur la /
T01D1110:11b-11: de yang gzhon nus chung ma'i don du blangs pa dang /
T01D1110:11b-12: de la drang srong 'ga' zhig gis smras pa /
T01D1110:11b-13: gal te khyed 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba don du gnyer zhing /
T01D1110:11b-14: grags pa khyad par can bsgrag par bya ba'i bsam pa yod na /

T01D1110:21b-1: 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su 'gyur pa lta smos
T01D1110:21b-2: kyang ci dgos zhes mi srid pa nyid du ston
T01D1110:21b-3: pa yin no // rna can 'thab dka' la sogs la //
T01D1110:21b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:21b-6: kun ti bo dza zhes bya ba'i rgyal po zhig
T01D1110:21b-7: yod pa de la kun di zhes bya ba'i bu
T01D1110:21b-8: mo gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pa phun sum
T01D1110:21b-9: tshogs pa zhig yod pa dang /
T01D1110:21b-10: ji tsam na drang srong gnas ngan zhes bya ba

T01D1110:21b-12: / myur bar bsgrubs te 'o thug gis bkang ba'i snod lag par blangs nas /
T01D1110:21b-13: lag pa'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong yang
T01D1110:21b-14: bzhin dang mdog rnam par 'gyur ba med par gus
T01D1110:21b-15: pa dang bcas par zas la spyod du bcug nas
T01D1110:21b-16: / zas kyi mthar yang lag pa'i pad+ma gnyis po
T01D1110:21b-17: de ma tshig par mthong nas yongs su mgu bas
T01D1110:21b-18: / smras pa / nga las mchog long shig gal
T01D1110:21b-19: te mnyes par gyur na bdag skyes bu gang dang
T01D1110:21b-20: gang 'dod pa de dang de bdag nyid kyi dbang
T01D1110:21b-21: du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mchog stsol cig /
T01D1110:21b-22: des de la rig sngags byin nas rig sngags 'di
T01D1110:21b-23: khyed kyis bzlas na lan lnga'i bar du khyed mngon
T01D1110:21b-24: par 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur ro zhes
T01D1110:21b-26: de yang gnas kyi sa gzhir 'dug ste /
T01D1110:21b-27: ci rig pa 'di'i don bden pa yin nam /
T01D1110:21b-28: 'on te ma yin zhes rtog pa skye zhing de
T01D1110:21b-29: nyams sad pa'i phyir de bzlas nas nyi ma dang
T01D1110:21b-30: phrad par gsol ba btab pa dang /
T01D1110:21b-31: skad cig ma de nyid la nyi ma shing rta
T01D1110:21b-32: dang bcas shing go cha dang bcas par drung na
T01D1110:21b-33: 'dug pa dang / de mthong nas kun dis nga'i gan du ma 'ongs shig ces bzlog pa dang /
T01D1110:21b-35: nga la gsol ba btab nas bya ba ma byas par nga mi ldog go //
T01D1110:21b-36: yang na khyed kyi rigs ma lus pa rnam par brlag pa'i dmod pa gdab par bya'o //
T01D1110:21b-38: ji ltar na rang gi rigs sun par byed ces smras pa dang /
T01D1110:21b-39: slar yang gzhon nu nyid du gyur pa'i mchog byin
T01D1110:21b-40: nas de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba spyad
T01D1110:21b-42: de'i rjes thogs nyid la rna can go cha bgos pa dang bcas pa /
T01D1110:21b-43: rna ba gnyis rna chas brgyan pa skyes par gyur to //
T01D1110:22a-0: ji tsam na grogs mo zhig gis sbrang @22a * //
T01D1110:22a-1: rtsi dang mar gyis kha bkang ste /
T01D1110:22a-2: shin tu 'jam pa'i gos kyis lus dkris nas sgrom gyi nang du bcug ste /
T01D1110:22a-3: de blangs nas gang+g'a'i ngogs su mtshan mo song ste /
T01D1110:22a-4: nyi ma'i bu ni mdzes pa 'di //
T01D1110:22a-5: sgrom ni rgya mtshos bsrung bar gyis //
T01D1110:22a-6: lha yi tshogs ni 'dus pa dang //
T01D1110:22a-7: tshangs pas kyang ni rtag tu srungs /
T01D1110:22a-8: ces smras nas gang+g'ar por ro //
T01D1110:22a-9: gang+g'a dang thag mi ring ba na yul 'khor srung
T01D1110:22a-10: gi rta'i spyan lhag pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba
T01D1110:22a-11: rta 'tsho zhing 'dug pas gang+g'a'i chu bos sgrom khyer
T01D1110:22a-13: de blang ba'i phyir 'khor rnams la bsgo nas khyer te 'ongs pa mthong ba dang /
T01D1110:22a-14: 'di nga'i bur bya'o snyam nas sos par gyur to //
T01D1110:22a-15: yang de'i tshe ri dbang chen na dga' byed dgra
T01D1110:22a-16: sta can zhes bya ba mtshon cha'i sbyor ba la
T01D1110:22a-17: mkhas pa zhig dka' thub spyod pa dang /
T01D1110:22a-18: des 'di ltar dam bcas te bram ze ma yin
T01D1110:22a-19: pa rnams langs mtshon cha'i sbyor ba 'di bslab par
T01D1110:22a-20: mi bya'o zhes dam bcas so //
T01D1110:22a-21: rna can des kyang bram ze'i cha lugs su byas te /
T01D1110:22a-22: de'i gan du song nas bram ze'i mtshon cha'i sbyor ba bslabs so //
T01D1110:22a-23: des kyang de la thams cad bslabs so //
T01D1110:22a-24: des mtshon cha'i sbyor ba legs par bslabs nas 'thab dka'i thad du song ste /
T01D1110:22a-25: de la bdag nyid rten ma'i phyir blta bas la /
T01D1110:22a-26: des kyang aang ga'i yul byin te aang ga'i rgyal por gyur to //
T01D1110:22a-27: de bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te /
T01D1110:22a-28: ji tsam na brgya byin gyis bsams pa /
T01D1110:22a-29: da ni 'thab pa'i dus dang nye bar gyur gyis /
T01D1110:22a-30: rna can 'di dang sred sgrub rtsod pa byed par
T01D1110:22a-31: 'gyur ro snyam nas brgya byin bram ze'i cha lugs
T01D1110:22a-32: su byas te rna can gyi gan du song ngo
T01D1110:22a-33: // des kyang ci'i don du 'ongs zhes lan gsum
T01D1110:22a-34: gyi bar du dris shing mgron du bos kyang gsal
T01D1110:22a-36: ji tsam na lan bdun gyi bar du ci zhig 'dod ces dris pa dang /
T01D1110:22a-37: khyod kyi go cha 'dod do zhe'o //
T01D1110:22a-39: ci'i phyir sngar khyed mi smra /
T01D1110:22a-40: the tshom med par khyod la sbyin par bya'o zhes smras nas /
T01D1110:22a-41: de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i spu gri blangs nas des
T01D1110:22a-42: lus las go cha bshus te de la byin pa
T01D1110:22a-43: dang / brgya byin yongs su mgu nas smras pa /
T01D1110:22a-44: gang gis slong ba mgu bya'i phyir //
T01D1110:22a-45: rang gi srog la'ang mi dpyod par //
T01D1110:22a-46: rna can lta bu'i sbyin byed med //
T01D1110:22b-0: nga dang 'dra ba'i @22b brtse bral med //
T01D1110:22b-2: 'di dag gi gtam ni shin tu mang mod kyi /
T01D1110:22b-4: 'thab dka' byung ba'i gtam ni 'di skad thos te /
T01D1110:22b-8: rgyas pa ste bzhi ni gang+g'a las skyes pas spun yin no ;
T01D1110:22b-9: / yan lag bkra sbyin ni dri za'i rgyal po
T01D1110:22b-10: yan lag bkra sbyin zhes bya bas ming gi 'khon
T01D1110:22b-12: sna tshogs brtson 'grus ni gcong chen pos btab nas shi'o //
T01D1110:22b-13: 'jigs byed ni tshangs par spyod pa la zhugs par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:22b-14: bde ldan mas 'jigs byed la smras pa /
T01D1110:22b-15: yu bu cag gi rabs chad par 'ong bas bu skyed pa'i rtsol ba gyis shing //
T01D1110:22b-17: nged gnyis spun yin mod kyi /
T01D1110:22b-18: nga ni gzhon nu nyid nas tshangs par spyod pas
T01D1110:22b-19: 'dod pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar mi byed
T01D1110:22b-21: de'i rigs rgyud thams cad 'dus te /
T01D1110:22b-22: rgyas pa la gsol ba btab nas /
T01D1110:22b-25: rtog ldan ma de gsum dang /
T01D1110:22b-26: rgyas pa 'dus pa las rim pa bzhin du /
T01D1110:22b-29: blo ldan zhes bya ba gsum skyes pa las /
T01D1110:22b-30: yul 'khor srung dmus long du gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:22b-31: skya bseng gis sa chen po kun du rgyal bar byas te /
T01D1110:22b-33: yul 'khor srung la rgyas pas mchog byin pa /
T01D1110:22b-34: khyed kyi chung ma'i dam pa dri za mo las
T01D1110:22b-35: bu brgya skye bar gyur cig / de las phu
T01D1110:22b-36: po 'thab dka' zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T01D1110:22b-37: // ji tsam na dri za mo mngal dang ldan
T01D1110:22b-38: par gyur nas lo gsum nas sha'i gong bu lcags
T01D1110:22b-39: kyi tho ba 'dra ba skyes pa dang /
T01D1110:22b-41: 'di sha'i dum bu brgyar gyis la so sor bzhag ste /
T01D1110:22b-42: chu bsil mos yang dang yang du gtor cing /
T01D1110:22b-43: de nas ji tsam na de las bu brgya dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa byung ba dang /
T01D1110:22b-44: blo ldan gyis yul 'khor srung la smras pa /
T01D1110:22b-45: 'thab dka' 'di ni sdig pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan
T01D1110:22b-46: pas gang gis na 'di la brten nas sgra ngan
T01D1110:22b-47: gyi rigs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur bar shes kyis
T01D1110:22b-48: / 'di rnam pa thams cad du gsad par bya ste /
T01D1110:23a-0: bu gcig bsad nas srog chags mang po'i srog byin pa la @23a * //
T01D1110:23a-1: ni nyes pa 'ga' yang yod par ma mthong ste /
T01D1110:23a-2: chos kyi bstan bcos dag las /
T01D1110:23a-4: sdig pa chen po de mi bya //
T01D1110:23a-5: sdig pa chung la don che ba //
T01D1110:23a-6: blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya //
T01D1110:23a-7: zhes 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /
T01D1110:23a-8: de bul brtse bas gsod par ma nus so //
T01D1110:23a-9: skya bseng ni nags su dka' thub la song ngo //
T01D1110:23a-10: blo ldan ni chos kyi tshig can yin la /
T01D1110:23a-11: yul 'khor srung ni nus pa med par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:23a-14: 'thab dka' g-yul 'gyed pa'i bar du rgya cher sbyar te /
T01D1110:23a-15: de'i tshe srid sgrub kyis gsol ba btab pas khyab
T01D1110:23a-16: 'jug ni shing rta'i kha lo par gyur nas g-yul
T01D1110:23a-17: ngor de drangs par gyur to //
T01D1110:23a-19: srid sgrub kyis dpung gi tshogs thams cad la bltas nas /
T01D1110:23a-21: kun di'i bus ni de bltas na //
T01D1110:23a-22: thams cad gnyen du rnam par gnas //
T01D1110:23a-23: mchog tu brtse bas non pa yis //
T01D1110:23a-24: zhum pa yis ni 'di skad smras //
T01D1110:23a-25: khyab 'jug gnyen rnams mthong bas na //
T01D1110:23a-27: bdag gi lus ni zhum gyur cing //
T01D1110:23a-28: kha yang yongs su skams par byed //
T01D1110:23a-29: nga yi lus ni 'dar gyur cing //
T01D1110:23a-30: spu yang rnam par ldang bar 'gyur //
T01D1110:23a-31: gzhu ni lag nas lhung gyur zhing //
T01D1110:23a-32: pags pa'ang yongs su tshig par gyur //
T01D1110:23a-33: nga yi yid ni rnam 'khor bas //
T01D1110:23a-34: gnas par bya bar nus ma gyur //
T01D1110:23a-35: gang gi don du rgyal srid dang //
T01D1110:23a-36: longs spyod bde ba 'dod gyur pa //
T01D1110:23a-37: de nyid srog dang nor rnams ni //
T01D1110:23a-38: spangs nas nga dang 'thab par gnas //
T01D1110:23a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smra zhing 'thab par mi byed do //
T01D1110:23a-40: ji tsam na khyab 'jug gis de spro ba dang bral bar mthong ba dang /
T01D1110:23a-41: sgra ngan rnams gsad par bya ba'i phyir spro ba bskyed pa smras pa /
T01D1110:23a-42: bum skyes 'jigs byed rgyal ba'i shing rta rna can dang //
T01D1110:23a-43: de bzhin 'jig rten dpa' bo gzhan dag nga yis bsad ;
T01D1110:23a-44: / khyed ni sems la mi dgar ma byed gsod par gyis //
T01D1110:23a-45: g-yul du dgra las nges par rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur //
T01D1110:23a-46: gzhan yang gang gis 'di kun rgyal 'gyur ba //
T01D1110:23a-47: de ni mi 'jig shes par gyis //
T01D1110:23a-48: mi 'jig pa dang mi zad pa //
T01D1110:23a-49: de ni sus kyang bsad mi nus //
T01D1110:23b-1: lus can dag ni rtag par bshad //
T01D1110:23b-2: 'jig cing tshad med gyur pas na //
T01D1110:23b-3: 'thab par gyis shig bha ra ta //
T01D1110:23b-4: dper na gos rnying dag ni bor nas su //
T01D1110:23b-5: sar pa gzhan dag mi ni len par byed //
T01D1110:23b-6: de bzhin lus ni rnying pa spangs nas su //
T01D1110:23b-7: lus gzhan sar pa dag ni len par byed //
T01D1110:23b-8: ces bya ba la sogs pa smras nas /
T01D1110:23b-9: de'i tshig gi rjes su 'brangs te /
T01D1110:23b-10: srid sgrub kyis g-yul bkye ba nas srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa bsad par gyur to //
T01D1110:23b-11: sems can rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T01D1110:23b-12: sems can zhes bya ba ni srog chags zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1110:23b-13: de la phan par bzhed pa ni phan pa nyid mdzad par bzhed pa'o //
T01D1110:23b-14: bzhed nas ci zhig mdzad ce na //
T01D1110:23b-15: khyod kyis srog kyang btang bar mdzad //
T01D1110:23b-17: 'dir pad+ma can la sogs pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dper sbyar bar bya'o /
T01D1110:23b-19: // / khyab 'jug gis ni sgyu byas nas //
T01D1110:23b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:23b-22: des sgyu byas nas ci zhig byas shes na /
T01D1110:23b-23: gom gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no //
T01D1110:23b-25: sa'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de mi'u thung gi
T01D1110:23b-26: gzugs su bsgyur nas gom pa gsum gyis stobs ldan
T01D1110:23b-28: sa de ni khyed kyi sa rtsva dang 'dra bar lan mang du btang zhing bor bar gyur to //
T01D1110:23b-29: ji lta bu khyed kyis she na /
T01D1110:23b-30: thar bzhed pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T01D1110:23b-31: nges par thar pa nyid thob par bzhed pa gang yin pa de ni thar pa bzhed pa'o //
T01D1110:23b-32: 'dir mthong dga' chen po la sogs pa'i mdo dper sbyar bar bya'o //
T01D1110:23b-33: khyab 'jug gis sgyu byas pa'i gtam gang yin pa de ni sngar /
T01D1110:23b-34: khyab 'jug mi'u thung gzugs bsgyur nas //
T01D1110:23b-35: zhes bya ba'i skabs su smras zin to //
T01D1110:23b-36: dga' byed srog gcod byed pa'i mdas //
T01D1110:23b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:23b-39: drang srong dza m'a dag ni zhes bya ba de'i chung ma brtul zhugs can ma zhes bya la /
T01D1110:23b-40: de'i bu ni dga' byed ces bya ba shin tu dpa' ba zhig yod la /
T01D1110:23b-41: yang de'i tshe srid sgrub pa brtson zhes bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste /
T01D1110:23b-42: de ba lang gi tshogs kyi gnas su song ba dang /
T01D1110:23b-43: drang srong mis byin zhes bya ba 'thab mo la
T01D1110:23b-44: mngon par dga' ba zhig yod pa de'i thad du
T01D1110:24a-1: ser ba'i sgras dza m'a dag ni 'dod bzhos kyi ba zhig yod pa skrag pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-2: rgyal po srid sgrub kyis dris pa na /
T01D1110:24a-4: dza m'a na'i bu 'phong slob pa'i gzhu rgyud brdabs
T01D1110:24a-5: pas ba 'di skrag pa yin no zhes byas pa
T01D1110:24a-6: dang / ngan spong gi rigs las byung ba'i dga' byed kyi pha rol gnon pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-7: yon tan gyi bsngags pa smras pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-8: de khros nas ci nas kyang /
T01D1110:24a-9: dga' byed dang lhan cig 'thab par bya ba'i nga
T01D1110:24a-10: rgyal skyes nas bsti gnas su song ste be'u phrogs
T01D1110:24a-11: pa dang / dga' byed bsam gtan la gnas pa'i lus kyi steng du sprul shi ba bsgyur ro ;
T01D1110:24a-12: / rdul can ma ni ngang tshul bzad po can yin pas /
T01D1110:24a-13: de me tog thur song ba na shing rnams rang nyid 'dud par byed do //
T01D1110:24a-14: des rgyal po mthong nas yid chags par gyur pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-15: de nas brtsams te shing rnams 'dud par mi byed do //
T01D1110:24a-16: de dza m'a na dag ni bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis shes pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-17: chung ma la khros pas dga' byed la /
T01D1110:24a-18: ma'i mgo bo chod cig ces smras pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-19: des kyang pas tshig tu bsgo ma thag mgo bcad par gyur to //
T01D1110:24a-21: bu mchog slongs shig ces byas pa dang /
T01D1110:24a-22: nges kyang bdag gi ma slar 'tsho bar mdzod cig pa'i mchog bslangs nas de 'tsho bar gyur to //
T01D1110:24a-23: de nas brtsams te rgyu des khros pas dga' byed
T01D1110:24a-24: kyis bdag gis 'jig rten du rgyal rigs gcig kyang
T01D1110:24a-25: med par bya'o zhes dam bcas so //
T01D1110:24a-26: de'i 'og tu dgra ste thogs te chas nas rgyal
T01D1110:24a-27: po srid sgrub dang lhan cig g-yul sprad nas ji
T01D1110:24a-28: tsam na de la lag pa stong yod pa dgra
T01D1110:24a-29: stas thams cad bcad des la lhags par byas so
T01D1110:24a-30: // de nas mgo btsugs nas rgyal rigs rnams rtsad nas brlag pa'i phyir zhugs shing /
T01D1110:24a-31: 'jig rten du rgyal rigs rnams med par byas so //
T01D1110:24a-32: de ltar na 'jig rten du rgyal rigs rnams med
T01D1110:24a-33: pa nyid du byas pas 'jig rten rgyal rigs med
T01D1110:24a-36: srog gcod byed pa'i mdas zhes bya ba smos te /
T01D1110:24a-37: srog chags rnams zad cing med par byed pa ni srog gcod pa ste /
T01D1110:24a-38: de byed pa'i mda' yin pas na /
T01D1110:24a-39: srog gcod byed pa'i mda' ste des so //
T01D1110:24b-0: grags pa thob @24b pa gang yin pa //
T01D1110:24b-1: zhes bya ba ni snyan pa thob cing rnyed pa'o //
T01D1110:24b-2: dga' byed ces bya ba ni dga' byed dgra sta can no //
T01D1110:24b-3: de zhes bya ba ni dga' byed kyi bya ba'o //
T01D1110:24b-4: khyod kyi bstan la zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la'o //
T01D1110:24b-5: grags pa min zhes bya ba ni mi snyan par gyur pa'o /
T01D1110:24b-6: de yang 'di ltar khyod kyi bstan pa la srog
T01D1110:24b-7: chags grog sbur tsam bsad pa yang smad par bya
T01D1110:24b-9: rgyal rigs rnams bsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T01D1110:24b-10: sgra ngan dang ni skya bseng dang //
T01D1110:24b-11: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T01D1110:24b-12: sgra ngan ni 'thab dka' la sogs pa'o //
T01D1110:24b-13: skya bseng ni g-yul ngor brtan pa la sogs pa ste de dag go //
T01D1110:24b-14: gang gi phyir ni g-yul pa kye ba //
T01D1110:24b-15: zhes bya ba ni rgyal srid kyi dpal gang gi don du g-yul 'gyed cing 'thab par byed pa'o //
T01D1110:24b-16: de yang rgyal srid kyi dpal nye bar bsdu ba'i
T01D1110:24b-17: don du de rnams kyis g-yul sprad pas dpung gi
T01D1110:24b-18: sde tshoms bco brgyad kyis grangs kyis bsdus pa'i srog
T01D1110:24b-19: chags rnams 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur to //
T01D1110:24b-20: dpal de zhes bya ba ni sa stengs kyi rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa ste /
